title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Cells in Lebanon: Details on Today’s Aerial and Artillery Attacks”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Artillery and aerial cell attacks; IDF has been attacking in Lebanon since this morning.

Earlier today, a combat aircraft and an air force vehicle attacked three terrorist cells in Lebanon. In addition, the IDF attacked Hezbollah terrorist organization’s operational infrastructure and also carried out artillery fire this morning in several areas in Lebanon.

Several launches were identified from the territory of Lebanon towards the territory of the State of Israel during the day. Additionally, air defense fighters successfully intercepted a suspicious aerial target that crossed from Lebanon towards the territory of the State of Israel.

Linked is the documentation of the attacks: https://bit.ly/3tBMevm
